alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 7:57PM CDT until June 05 at 6:42AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying farmland occurs and water begins to approach Stateline Road north of the river gauge. At 29.0 feet, Stateline Road is flooded north of the river gauge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 33.4 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 1am 1am 1am Marais Des Cygnes River Trading Post 27.0 10.9 Tue 7pm 13.2 27.7 33.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
